name: AREA 17
description:
AREA 17 is a digital product agency with studios in Paris and New York. Founded in 2003, the company is independently owned and creatively motivated. They plan, create and grow digital products, helping their clients succeed by delivering products that improve life, work and play. They specialize in responsive websites and mobile apps and take an interdisciplinary approach to problem-solving and place a strong emphasis on every detail from design to code.
Learn more on area17.com.
